text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @EsperDoD @SecPompeo I see trump's still meeting with others, no distancing, no masks. And he thinks the mask makes him "look ridiculous"? What about the orange makeup? But, please, keep pretending the virus isn't raging at the White House.  #Darwinism #LiarInChief #Coronavirus
